alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 2:22PM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 35 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas, San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, Orange County Coastal Areas and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From noon Monday to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur Monday afternoon and evening, especially near the coast.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
